channel.title: ev.ixe TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from ev.ixe

item.title: my first mass ride experience at @pimpmybike.sg 's 2025 CNY mass ride ~ the chorus of engines, the sheer number of bikes, a community, a group. the next time, i'll be riding on my own bike alongside my rider @shinobi.rides and our people. ‚ô° #fyp #fyps
item.description: my first mass ride experience at @pimpmybike.sg 's 2025 CNY mass ride ~ the chorus of engines, the sheer number of bikes, a community, a group. the next time, i'll be riding on my own bike alongside my rider @shinobi.rides and our people. ‚ô° #fyp #fyps

item.title: Picture credits: @abg_japple & Ray @motorydez ! Thank you for capturing the moments where I feel the most liberated and comfortable in my own skin (and helmet), alongside the machine that makes me feel like I'm living and not simply existing. #sgbikers #m
item.description: Picture credits: @abg_japple & Ray @motorydez ! Thank you for capturing the moments where I feel the most liberated and comfortable in my own skin (and helmet), alongside the machine that makes me feel like I'm living and not simply existing. #sgbikers #m
item.author: ev.ixe

item.title: As a newly minted road user with a 2B license, being on the roads can be rather intimidating. I'm learning all about road etiquettes and unwritten rules as I gain more experience riding. Had a rider put up his hand when I gave way for him to overtake and
item.description: As a newly minted road user with a 2B license, being on the roads can be rather intimidating. I'm learning all about road etiquettes and unwritten rules as I gain more experience riding. Had a rider put up his hand when I gave way for him to overtake and
item.author: ev.ixe

item.title: As much as it's fully stock at the moment, it's a work in progress and I'm constantly in awe when I look at it. I'm trying to figure out a way to attach a small Toothless figurine onto it somewhere... cr. @abg_japple #motorcycle #bikerlife #bikersoftikto
item.description: As much as it's fully stock at the moment, it's a work in progress and I'm constantly in awe when I look at it. I'm trying to figure out a way to attach a small Toothless figurine onto it somewhere... cr. @abg_japple #motorcycle #bikerlife #bikersoftikto
item.author: ev.ixe

item.title: Melancholic Monday. A little reminder to myself and whoever else needs to hear it. We're all just doing our best and that's enough. #CapCut #sgfyp #sgbikers #bikers #motorcycle #xybca #fyp
item.description: Melancholic Monday. A little reminder to myself and whoever else needs to hear it. We're all just doing our best and that's enough. #CapCut #sgfyp #sgbikers #bikers #motorcycle #xybca #fyp
item.author: ev.ixe

item.title: I'm all for terrorizing my friends at every red light stops but @jaydeebmax , STOP TOUCHING OUR BIKES. (N was just spectating the chaos from behind us.) I had a field day editing this- #bikesquad #bikelife #sgbikers #motorbike #bikerlife #bikers #rideori
item.description: I'm all for terrorizing my friends at every red light stops but @jaydeebmax , STOP TOUCHING OUR BIKES. (N was just spectating the chaos from behind us.) I had a field day editing this- #bikesquad #bikelife #sgbikers #motorbike #bikerlife #bikers #rideori
item.author: ev.ixe

item.title: It's Melancholic Monday once again. So here's a little poetry I stumbled upon that I wanted to share! At the same time, it's been a month since I passed my license. Thank you @motorydez for my ride. It still feels surreal up 'till this day that I'm riding
item.description: It's Melancholic Monday once again. So here's a little poetry I stumbled upon that I wanted to share! At the same time, it's been a month since I passed my license. Thank you @motorydez for my ride. It still feels surreal up 'till this day that I'm riding
item.author: ev.ixe

item.title: Looking back at moments like this that I've captured while on the road makes me feel fbskfbskrnakrn. I've never felt comfortable putting myself out there to be perceived but I think I'm starting to warm up to the idea of being a little moment in someone's
item.description: Looking back at moments like this that I've captured while on the road makes me feel fbskfbskrnakrn. I've never felt comfortable putting myself out there to be perceived but I think I'm starting to warm up to the idea of being a little moment in someone's
item.author: ev.ixe

item.title: This new chapter in my life‚ÄîI embrace wholeheartedly. I was never one to turn the pages with enthusiasm, yet just like the child I once was‚Äîstaying up all night, drowning my thoughts in the make-believe‚Äîthe future no longer feels as terrifying as I once
item.description: This new chapter in my life‚ÄîI embrace wholeheartedly. I was never one to turn the pages with enthusiasm, yet just like the child I once was‚Äîstaying up all night, drowning my thoughts in the make-believe‚Äîthe future no longer feels as terrifying as I once
item.author: ev.ixe

item.title: Nights like these remind me that no matter how fleeting these moments are, I have good in my life, that I am doing okay. @Mimi ·Øì‚òÖ you're next and I'm rooting for you alongside @jaydeebmax & @sharil berlandier ! #sgtiktok #sgbikers #sgfyp #bikersoftiktok
